it.polimi.se2019.server.playeractions

Class ShootWeaponSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.playeractions.PlayerAction
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.playeractions.ShootWeaponSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Targetable, java.io.Serializable

    public class ShootWeaponSelection
extends PlayerAction
    This action is used to choose a weapon to shoot with, and then make the Controller switch to WaitingForEffects State. All action units are selected and dealt with in that state, and it expects the actual ShootPlayerAction.
    Author:
    Andrea Huang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void run()
        Description copied from class: PlayerAction
        This method is used to apply the effect of the player action. The model will be edited by accessing the game attribute that contains a reference to the game. This method it's called by the controller after running the check() method
